title: The Sea Devil's Eye
description: Iakhovas has caused more destruction than any force since the Time of Troubles, but his true objective has been a mystery . . . until now.When a young sailor's journey is complete, an aging bard's final song is sung, and a malenti priestess faces her most challenging test, the Threat from the Sea concludes in an explosive climax that will set all of Faer√ªn reeling.
author: Mel Odom
